| HistoryText             = Originally, the '''Silver Bullet Gang''' was a group of [[Werewolf|lycanthrope]] hunters operating in the wild west. Eventually they were attacked by the very thing they were hunting becoming [[Werewolf|werewolves]] themselves.{{r|Runaways Vol  2 22}}

They were eventually run out of [[Los Angeles]] by [[Robert Minoru (Earth-616)|Robert]] and [[Tina Minoru (Earth-616)|Tina Minoru]] under [[Pride (Earth-616)|The Pride]]'s direction.{{r|Runaways Vol  2 22}}

When news got out that the Pride had been murdered,{{r|Runaways Vol 1 17}} the Silver Bullet Gang returned to L.A. though the [[Runaways (Earth-616)|Runaways]] quickly defeated them.{{r|Runaways Vol  2 22}}
